74072.<pipipi_low>\n「どの写真を 見せていただけるのですか？ \n<br: <pipipi_low>Which photos would you like to show me?<break>

74073.<pipipi_low>\n「どの七不思議について 聞きたいですか？ \n<br:
<pipipi_low>Which of the Seven Wonders would you like to
hear about?<break>

76280.<pipipi_low>\n「ほかの写真も 見せていただけますか？ \n<bre: <pipipi_low>Can you show me some other pictures?<break>

76281.<pipipi_low>\n「ほかに 聞きたいことはありますか？\n<break: <pipipi_low>Is there anything else you'd like to ask?<break>

76282.<pipipi_high>\n「先生の研究レポートも まとめているわ。\n どの:
<pipipi_high>I'll be putting together a report on your
research... Which of the Seven Wonders would
you like to talk about?<break>

79227.<pipipi_high>\n「『<%sM_Title>』について\n 聞きたい:
<pipipi_high>He wants to know about the <%sM_Title>. Do
you want to hear about the mystery first?<yesno><break>

79228.<pipipi_high>\n「それじゃあ 先生が調べた\n 『<%sM_Tit:
<pipipi_high>Okay, I'm going to read the description of
<%sM_Title> that you looked up... Let's see,
this...<bw_break>

79229.<pipipi_high>\n「『砂塵にうごめく大巨人』ですね。\n とある勇敢:
"The Great Titan in the Dust"... A brave warrior, before he went missing, told a frightened story... I... I see... I see a
figure as big as a mountain staring at me from behind a cloud of dust. .... What? How big is it?

79230.<pipipi_high>\n「『プクランドの首長竜』ですね。\n これは プク:
"The Emir of Pukland." This is a story about a fisherman from the continent of Pukland who saw something strange in a lake. While he was
fishing, a huge shadow with a long neck appeared on the surface of the lake in the distance... Huh... This is so romantic!

79231.<pipipi_high>\n「『エルトナの生き人形』ですね。\n これはエルト:
"The Living Dolls of Eltona"... This is a rumor that is rapidly spreading among the children of Eltona... According to the story,
a doll was seen moving around in the forest... The idea of a doll moving gives me the creeps...

79232.<pipipi_high>\n「『深き森の幽霊列車』ですね。\n これは とある:
"Ghost Train in the Deep Forest"... This is a story about a ghost train that runs along an abandoned railway line deep in the woods...
It's a story about a ghost train that runs along an abandoned railway line deep in the woods. But just as he was preparing to die,
the train slipped through his body and passed him by... That's scary!

79234.<pipipi_high>\n「『海上に浮かぶ夢幻郷』ですね。\n 突然 海の上:
"A Dreamscape at Sea"... A city that appears and disappears out of nowhere on the sea... I've heard that if you approach it with a
boat, it disappears like a vapour... It's really creepy, and I can't stop feeling bad about it...

79235.<pipipi_high>\n「『ドワチャッカの謎の飛行物体』ですね。 \n ド:
"The Mysterious Flying Object of Dowa Chakka"... In a place on the continent of Dowa Chakka where the stars are beautiful, a
mysterious luminous object appears in the sky... That's what I heard. According to eyewitnesses, the object was moving in an
erratic manner that could not have been caused by a shooting star. ... I'm... I'm starting to get nervous...

79236.<pipipi_high>\n「『吹雪にほほえむ雪女』ですね。 \n 吹雪の晩に:
"The Snow Woman Who Smiles in the Blizzard"... On the night of the blizzard, a beautiful woman appears and anyone who sees
her will be frozen to death. That's what I heard. It's a serious game to take a picture... A life-threatening mission... This
is the Daigo flavor of fushigi-kenkyu.
